long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Summarize any website with Summate. Save time on long blogs, articles, and videos — get key ideas instantly. Efficient. Accurate.

**Top Features**:
✅ Instant TLDRs: Our AI extension provides concise summaries of any longform article in seconds.
✅ Key Takeaways: Extract essential points from web content quickly and easily.
✅ Video Summaries: Get the gist of YouTube videos without watching the entire content.
✅ Navigate with Ease: Click on any takeaway to locate its source in the original text instantly.
✅ Versatile Compatibility: Works on various websites, from news articles to research papers.

**Works best with**:
- News and Current Events
- Business and Finance Articles
- Research Papers and Academic Content
- Long-form Blog Posts
- YouTube Videos and Online Lectures

**Tech features**:
- Instant results: Summarize content in seconds
- Handles lengthy content: Capable of summarizing very long articles and videos
- Powered by advanced AI: Utilizes cutting-edge language models for accurate summaries
- Browser compatibility: Works on Chromium-based browsers like Google Chrome and Arc

Summate Extension is designed to help you navigate the information overload of the internet. Whether you're reading a lengthy news article, researching a complex topic, or trying to grasp the key points of a video lecture, our AI-powered tool provides you with concise summaries and essential takeaways in seconds.

With Summate, you can read any article in less than 30 seconds, allowing you to quickly decide if it's worth a full read. Our extension also helps you navigate long content effortlessly - simply click on any takeaway to jump to its source in the original text.

For video content, Summate extracts key ideas without you having to watch the entire video, saving you valuable time. Our summaries are designed to capture the essence of the content accurately, though we always recommend referring to the original for critical information.

Already 1.8k people use Summate today. 

Join busy high performers and save a lot of time!
